dublin_core.dcvalue: MD on Tap a PDA application that searches and retrieves biomedical literature is specifically designed for use by mobile healthcare professionals With the goal of improving the usability of the application a preliminary comparison was made of two search engines PubMed and Essie to determine which provided most efficient path to the desired clinically relevant information
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T18:03:37Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2006-06-16
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Preliminary comparison of the Essie and PubMed search engines for answering clinical questions using MD on Tap, a PDA-based program for accessing biomedical literature.
